data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shin, Chulwoo, Chaboo, Caroline S. (2012): A revision and phylogenetic analysis of Stoiba Spaeth 1909 (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae). ZooKeys 224: 1-36, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.224.2964, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.224.2964
